titles.title: There's Joy Deep Down, Flowing Like A River

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O, there's joy deep down, flowing like a river,
Flowing like the river of the Lord.
O, there's joy deep down, flowing out from holy ground.
O, there's joy like the river of the Lord.
Chorus:
So let it flow (Ladies),
From the mountains (Men),
Let it flow (Ladies),
Down to the sea (Men).
Like a river of living waters flowing out from you and me,
Like the new and living way from deep within the veil,
Let it flow. Let it flow.
Oh, let it flow, like the river of the Lord.
